reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 358/99: EXEMPTION - SNC-LAVALIN ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS INC.
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXEMPTION — SNC-LAVALIN ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS INC.
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 358/99: EXEMPTION - SNC-LAVALIN ENGINEERS AND CONSTRUCTORS INC.
reg_info.act_under: Fairness is a Two-Way Street Act (Construction Labour Mobility), 1999   Loi de 1999 portant que la justice n’est pas à sens unique (mobilité de la main-d’oeuvre dans l’industrie de la construction)

content.content: 1. SNC-Lavalin Engineers & Constructors Inc. is exempt from the Act. O. Reg. 358/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. SNC-Lavalin Engineers & Constructors Inc. is exempt from the Act. O. Reg. 358/99, s. 1.
